channel.title: rake on Vegetable Programing
channel.description: Recent content in rake on Vegetable Programing

item.title: rake taskのテスト
item.description: module Tasks class SampleTest < ActiveSupport::TestCase describe 'rake task sample' do before do @rake = Rake::Application.new Rake.application = @rake Rails.application.load_tasks Rake::Task.define_task(:environment) end describe 'sample:exec' do it 'done without errores.' do assert { @rake['sample:exec'].execute } end end end end end executeなので一度しか実行されない事象は起きないはずだが
